org.fishwife.jrugged.spring

Class CircuitBreakerBeanFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fishwife.jrugged.CircuitBreakerFactory
      • org.fishwife.jrugged.spring.CircuitBreakerBeanFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

    public class CircuitBreakerBeanFactory
extends CircuitBreakerFactory
implements org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    Factory to create new CircuitBreakerBean instances and keep track of them. If a MBeanExportOperations is set, then the CircuitBreakerBean will be automatically exported as a JMX MBean.

    • Field Summary

        CONFIG_KEY_PREFIX, LIMIT_KEY, RESETMILLIS_KEY, WINDOWMILLIS_KEY

      Set the MBeanExportOperations to use to export CircuitBreakerBean instances as JMX MBeans.
      void setPackageScanBase(String packageScanBase)

public void setMBeanExporter(org.springframework.jmx.export.MBeanExporter mBeanExporter)

        Set the MBeanExporter to use to export CircuitBreakerBean instances as JMX MBeans.

      • setMBeanExportOperations

        public void setMBeanExportOperations(org.springframework.jmx.export.MBeanExportOperations mBeanExportOperations)
        Set the MBeanExportOperations to use to export CircuitBreakerBean instances as JMX MBeans.
        Parameters:
        mBeanExportOperations - the MBeanExportOperations to set.

      • setPackageScanBase

        public void setPackageScanBase(String packageScanBase)
        If specified, CircuitBreakerBeanFactory will scan all classes under packageScanBase for methods with the CircuitBreaker annotation and initialize circuitbreakers for them.
        Parameters:
        packageScanBase - Where should the scan for annotations begin

      • buildAnnotatedCircuitBreakers

        public void buildAnnotatedCircuitBreakers()
        If packageScanBase is defined will search packages for CircuitBreaker annotations and create circuitbreakers for them.

      • createCircuitBreaker

        public CircuitBreaker createCircuitBreaker(String name,
                                           CircuitBreakerConfig config)
        Create a new CircuitBreakerBean and map it to the provided value. If the MBeanExportOperations is set, then the CircuitBreakerBean will be exported as a JMX MBean. If the CircuitBreaker already exists, then the existing instance is returned.
        Overrides:
        createCircuitBreaker in class CircuitBreakerFactory
        Parameters:
        name - the value for the CircuitBreaker
        config - the CircuitBreakerConfig

      • findCircuitBreakerBean

        public CircuitBreakerBean findCircuitBreakerBean(String name)
        Find an existing CircuitBreakerBean
        Parameters:
        name - the value for the CircuitBreakerBean
        Returns:
        the found CircuitBreakerBean, or null if it is not found.
